claim: Quiet from Metal Gear would be a poor hypothetical choice for lecturer at Haub.

supporting.text: Quiet lacks formal education or credentials typically required for a lecturer position at a reputable institution like Haub.

attacks.text: Quiet lacks formal education or credentials typically required for a lecturer position at a reputable institution like Haub.
Quiet possesses extensive real-world experience in tactical operations and survival, which could provide unique practical insights to students.
Real-world experience alone is insufficient to meet the accreditation standards for lecturers at institutions like Haub, which require formal qualifications.
Haub could make an exception for Quiet due to her unique expertise, as institutions sometimes do for individuals with exceptional non-traditional backgrounds.
Exceptions are rare and typically reserved for individuals with widely recognized public achievements, which Quiet lacks due to her covert background.

supporting.text: Her background as a sniper and assassin does not align with the academic or professional expertise expected in a lecturer.

attacks.text: Her background as a sniper and assassin does not align with the academic or professional expertise expected in a lecturer.
Military and tactical expertise can provide unique insights into security studies or conflict resolution, which are relevant academic fields.
Quiet lacks formal academic credentials or teaching experience, which are critical for a lecturer role.
Her unconventional background could attract student interest and diversify perspectives in the classroom.
Assassination experience is ethically incompatible with the values of an educational institution.

supporting.text: Quiet's unique perspective on survival and combat could provide valuable insights in a specialized course on military strategy or unconventional warfare.

attacks.text: Quiet's unique perspective on survival and combat could provide valuable insights in a specialized course on military strategy or unconventional warfare.
Quiet's inability to speak would severely limit her ability to effectively communicate complex strategic concepts to students.
Alternative communication methods like writing or sign language could compensate for Quiet's lack of speech.
Academic lecturing requires formal pedagogical training which Quiet lacks, regardless of her field experience.
Her extreme specialization in stealth combat doesn't translate well to broader military strategy education.
Guest lecturers often specialize in narrow fields and can provide depth rather than breadth.

supporting.text: Her inability to speak due to her condition would severely limit her effectiveness in delivering lectures or engaging with students.

attacks.text: Her inability to speak due to her condition would severely limit her effectiveness in delivering lectures or engaging with students.
Modern assistive technologies like speech synthesizers or text-to-speech software could compensate for her inability to speak.
Assistive technologies may not fully replicate the nuance and spontaneity of live human interaction in a lecture setting.
Non-verbal communication methods like sign language or visual presentations could be equally effective for lecture delivery.
Not all students may be proficient in sign language, creating accessibility barriers.
Her unique perspective as a non-verbal individual could provide valuable insights into alternative teaching methods.

supporting.text: Her firsthand experience in high-stakes environments could be compelling for students studying psychology or crisis management.

attacks.text: Her firsthand experience in high-stakes environments could be compelling for students studying psychology or crisis management.
Quiet's lack of formal education or teaching experience undermines her ability to effectively convey knowledge in an academic setting.
Many successful lecturers rely on practical experience rather than formal credentials, especially in applied fields like psychology.
Her inability to speak (due to her parasite condition) would prevent effective communication with students.
Alternative communication methods like sign language or written materials could compensate for her inability to speak.
Her background as a trained assassin could create ethical concerns for the university and discomfort among students.
Many universities invite controversial figures with unique backgrounds to provide diverse perspectives.

supporting.text: The controversial nature of her past actions could create ethical concerns for the institution in hiring her as a lecturer.

attacks.text: The controversial nature of her past actions could create ethical concerns for the institution in hiring her as a lecturer.
Her past actions were under extreme circumstances and do not reflect her potential as a lecturer.
Extreme circumstances do not excuse unethical behavior, especially in an educational setting.
Many institutions value diverse perspectives, including those with controversial pasts, to enrich learning.
Diverse perspectives should not come at the cost of compromising ethical standards.
